scripts.preinstall: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then cat Brewfile; echo; echo; read -p "Install Brewfile dependencies as shown above (y/N)?" -n 1 -r; echo; if [ "$REPLY" == "y" ]; then brew bundle check || brew bundle install; fi; fi
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then pre-commit install --install-hooks --overwrite; fi
scripts.detect-secrets: git ls-files -z | xargs -0 detect-secrets-hook --verbose --baseline .secrets.baseline # pragma: allowlist-secret
scripts.build:app: cd projects/app && rm -rf dist && cp -r ./src ./dist && find dist -type f ! -name '*.njk' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -f && cp -r ./src/static dist && cp ./Makefile dist && sass dist/static/shared-cache/application.scss dist/static/shared-cache/application.css --no-source-map && rm dist/static/shared-cache/application.scss && csso dist/static/shared-cache/application.css --output dist/static/shared-cache/application.css && rolldown -c rolldown.config.ts && cp ../../package.json ./dist/package.json
scripts.watch:app: npm run build:app && chokidar "./projects/app/src/**/*" -c "npm run build:app"
scripts.run:app: npm run watch:app & cd projects/app && sam local start-api
scripts.generate-openapi:app: cd projects/app && rm -rf dist_openapi && tsc && fastify generate-swagger --yaml=true dist_openapi/app.js > openapi.yaml
